65%,#f2f5f7);bottom:0;flex-shrink:0;height:60px;left:0;margin-left:-35px;position:sticky;width:340px}.book-cards{display:grid;padding-top:40px;position:relative}.book-card,.book-cards{background-color:#f6f6f6}.book-card{border-radius:4px;box-shadow:-1px
